title: Meeting someone at a bar
description: First conversation with someone you find attractive at a bar

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: Hi, how are you?

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Good, thanks. And you?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: All good. Do you come here often?
options: ¿Te puedo invitar algo? (Can I buy you a drink?)
Me encanta este lugar (I love this place)
Es mi primera vez acá (It's my first time here)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.spanish: Sí, es mi bar favorito. ¿Vos sos de acá?
dialog.english: Yeah, it's my favorite bar. Are you from here?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: No, soy yankee. Vine a conocer Buenos Aires.
dialog.english: No, I'm American. I came to get to know Buenos Aires.
options: ¿Qué me recomendás hacer? (What do you recommend I do?)
Recién llegué hace una semana (I just arrived a week ago)
Me encanta la ciudad (I love the city)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.spanish: ¡Qué copado! Hay mucho para hacer acá.
dialog.english: How cool! There's a lot to do here.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Sos re copada. ¿Me pasás tu insta?
dialog.english: You're really cool. Can you give me your Instagram?
options: ¿Querés salir algún día? (Want to go out sometime?)
¿Puedo pedirte el número? (Can I get your number?)
Me caés re bien (I really like you)

title: Making weekend plans
description: Suggesting activities for the weekend with someone you're interested in

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Che, ¿qué vas a hacer este finde?
dialog.english: Hey, what are you doing this weekend?

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: I don't have many plans yet. Why?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: Want to go for a drink?
options: ¿Qué te parece si vamos a la playa? (What do you think if we go to the beach?)
Espero que encontremos una joda (I hope we find a party)
Podemos hacer la previa en mi casa (We can do previa at my place)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Sure! I love the idea.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: Great. Saturday early evening?
options: Te escribo para coordinar (I'll text you to coordinate)
¿Dónde preferís ir? (Where do you prefer to go?)
Conozco un bar re copado (I know a really cool bar)

title: After a good date
description: Following up after a successful first date

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: I had a really good time last night.

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.spanish: Yo también. Fue re copado charlar con vos.
dialog.english: Me too. It was really cool chatting with you.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: I'd love to see you again.
options: ¿Querés hacer algo esta semana? (Want to do something this week?)
Tenés buena onda (You have good vibes)
Me caés re bien (I really like you)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Yes! When are you free?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Estoy libre el jueves o viernes.
dialog.english: I'm free Thursday or Friday.
options: ¿Qué te parece el jueves? (What do you think about Thursday?)
Vos elegí el día (You choose the day)
El viernes podemos ir a los boliches (Friday we can go to the clubs)

title: Asking for directions
description: Getting help finding a location in Buenos Aires

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Disculpe, ¿dónde queda la estación de subte más cercana?
dialog.english: Excuse me, where is the nearest subway station?

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.spanish: Andá recto tres cuadras y doblá a la izquierda.
dialog.english: Go straight three blocks and turn left.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: And then?
options: ¿Está lejos? (Is it far?)
Muchas gracias (Thank you very much)
¿Cuántas cuadras son? (How many blocks is it?)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.spanish: Cruzás la avenida y está a la vuelta de la esquina.
dialog.english: Cross the avenue and it's around the corner.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: Perfect, thank you very much.

title: Ordering drinks at a bar
description: Ordering for yourself and asking what someone else wants

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: What do you want to drink?

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: I don't know, what do you recommend?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: El fernet con coca es re típico de acá.
dialog.english: Fernet with coke is really typical from here.
options: También tienen buena birra (They also have good beer)
Yo voy a tomar una chela (I'm going to have a beer)
Podemos pedir vino (We can order wine)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Sure, let's try the fernet then.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Dos fernets con coca, por favor.
dialog.english: Two fernets with coke, please.
options: Invito yo (It's on me)
¿Dividimos? (Should we split it?)
Después pedimos algo más (We'll order more later)

title: Talking about your background
description: Explaining who you are and what you do

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Where are you from?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: I'm from the United States.
options: Soy yankee (I'm American)
Vine hace un mes (I came a month ago)
Estoy de visita (I'm visiting)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: And what do you do?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: I work from home as a programmer.
options: Laburo en tecnología (I work in tech)
Estoy trabajando remoto desde acá (I'm working remotely from here)
¿Vos de qué laburás? (What do you do for work?)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: How cool! I study design.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: What neighborhood do you live in?
options: Yo vivo en Palermo (I live in Palermo)
¿Está bueno tu barrio? (Is your neighborhood good?)
¿Vivís cerca de acá? (Do you live near here?)

title: Suggesting to continue the night
description: Keeping the night going after drinks

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: I'm having a really good time.

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.spanish: Yo también. Este bar está copado.
dialog.english: Me too. This bar is cool.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: Want to go somewhere else?
options: Conozco un boliche cerca (I know a club nearby)
Podemos ir a tomar algo a mi casa (We can go have a drink at my place)
¿Vamos a caminar un toque? (Should we go walk a bit?)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Sure, what do you have in mind?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Hay un lugar tranquilo a unas cuadras de acá.
dialog.english: There's a quiet place a few blocks from here.
options: O podemos seguir charlando en mi pieza (Or we can keep chatting at my room)
Hay una joda buena cerca (There's a good party nearby)
Vamos donde vos quieras (Let's go wherever you want)

title: Declining politely
description: Saying no to an invitation without being rude

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Want to come to my place?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Disculpame, pero me tengo que ir.
dialog.english: Sorry, but I have to go.
options: La pasé re bien igual (I had a really good time though)
Capaz otro día (Maybe another day)
Tengo que levantarme temprano (I have to wake up early)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: No problem, I understand.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Pero me encantaría verte de nuevo.
dialog.english: But I'd love to see you again.
options: ¿Te escribo mañana? (Can I text you tomorrow?)
¿Hacemos algo esta semana? (Should we do something this week?)
Me caés re bien (I really like you)

title: Talking about nightlife preferences
description: Discussing what you like to do when going out

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Do you like nightclubs?

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Prefiero ir a bares o fiestas en casas.
dialog.english: I prefer to go to bars or house parties.
options: Los boliches son re al pedo (Clubs are really pointless)
Me gusta más charlar en bares (I like chatting in bars more)
¿Vos qué preferís? (What do you prefer?)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.spanish: Yo también. Es más tranquilo para charlar.
dialog.english: Me too. It's calmer for chatting.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Sí, mal. En los boliches no podés ni escuchar.
dialog.english: Yeah, exactly. In clubs you can't even hear.
options: Prefiero la previa que el boliche (I prefer previa over clubs)
Me copa más un bar copado (I prefer a cool bar more)
¿Salís mucho? (Do you go out a lot?)

title: Complimenting someone
description: Giving genuine compliments in a casual way

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.english: You have good vibes.

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: Thanks, you too.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Sos re copada. Me caés re bien.
dialog.english: You're really cool. I really like you.
options: Sos re linda (You're really pretty)
Me encanta charlar con vos (I love chatting with you)
Sos un grossa (You're awesome/a legend)

dialog.speaker: other
dialog.english: How nice, thank you.

dialog.speaker: you
dialog.spanish: Es la posta. No es chamuyo.
dialog.english: It's the truth. It's not BS.
options: En serio, la estoy pasando re bien (Seriously, I'm having a really good time)
Me gustás (I like you)
Sos re interesante (You're really interesting)
